children.title: About Project
children.description: Project Online can transform the way your company manage your core business and resources.

children.title: KB
children.description: Talk to me about any subject regarding to Project, I will try my best.

children.title: Tasks and Resources
children.description: You can ask about the day by day procedures on tasks and resources.

children.title: Tasks
children.description: The Task is the entity which defines what to do, who does and when it gets done.

children.title: Resources
children.description: Learn how to add and work with resource within your plan.

children.title: Configuration
children.description: A good project plan is a day by day work increment and reviewing, so let's configure.

children.title: Project
children.description: Learn how to configure your project so Project Online can do the hard work.

children.title: Calendar
children.description: Configure calendar exceptions and resource specific needs.

children.title: Outline
children.description: Define your WBS or structure your Sprint directly on the Gantt.

children.title: Planning
children.description: Learn how to plan using Project Online tools.

children.title: Reports
children.description: Everything about your project including task reporting and resource utilization.
